name: Kiri Hodi (Coconut Milk Gravy)
description: Mild coconut milk curry, served with kiribath
instructions: Add onions, chilies, curry leaves (Curry leaves must be fresh for authentic taste)
Add lime juice at the end
cultural_notes: Traditional accompaniment to kiribath at New Year
description_sinhala: මෘදු පොල් කිරි ව්‍යංජනය, කිරිබත් සමඟ පිළිගැන්වේ
description_tamil: லேசான தேங்காய் பால் கறி, கிரிபாத்துடன் பரிமாறப்பட்டது
cultural_notes_sinhala: අලුත් අවුරුද්දේ කිරිබත් සඳහා සම්ප්‍රදායික වාදනය
